MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the TD7 postcode area of Selkirk. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1.36pm to remove a tree from the overhead line located at Oakwood Farm and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.39pm on Tuesday 29th December 2020.
